attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248209. The all-new Honda Ballade RS MODEL 8 INCH TOUCHSCREEN LEATHER SEATS ANDRIOD AUTO SERVICE PLAN – 60 000KM OR 4 YEARS WARRANTY PLAN – 200 000KM OR 5 YEARS AA ROADSIDE ASSIST – 3 YEARS Honda cars have a reputation for reliability and the Honda Ballade is no exception. A highlight of the Ballade Honda car is its comfortable and stylish interior. The spacious interior provides plenty of room for the whole family. The new RS Model comes in with a striking style that creates a sleek and sporty appearance. It’s clean and sculpted, is larger in size and comes standard with superior protection.

Please contact us to arrange a Taylor made Deal to match your pocket, trade-ins are welcome, and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. Finance is available with all the major banks as we are an approved dealer.

attributes.description:
With its eye-catching exterior styling, bold headlamps and muscular stance, the all-new KIA Seltos is a compact SUV like no other. Not that you would expect anything less from KIA: with one of the most awarded design teams in the world, state-of-the-art production technology and world-class quality credentials, the Seltos is the car you’ve been waiting for. 

All prices exclude metallic paint, administration, delivery and license registration fees. Prices subject to change without prior notice. Test drives welcome. attributes.agent_name: Motus Select George Kia New Cars
attributes.description:
The Kia Pegas comes with a long list of standard features such as a reverse-view camera, rear parking sensors, as well as the Apple CarPlay- and Android Auto compatible 7-inch infotainment system with Bluetooth. The driver’s seat also features an armrest, making long trips more comfortable. The Kia Pegas also has the largest boot capacity in its segment, offering 475-litre luggage capacity.  The Pegas comes standard with Kia’s industry-leading 5-year/unlimited-kilometer warranty and roadside assistance, as well as a 4-year/60 000 km service plan.

All prices exclude administration, delivery and license registration fees. Prices subject to change without prior notice. Test drives welcome. Finance available through all major banks. Finance is subject to Bank Approval. Trade-ins will be considered.  We deliver nationwide. Contact Gianni or Jason at Kia George for more information. T’s & C’s Apply.
